greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The siteswap sequence (the deltas p[i]-i, i in ]-inf,+inf[, folded from Z to N, mapping 0->1, 1->2, -1->3, 2->4, -2->5, etc.) for A065260.
xref: The bisection giving the positive half of Z is A000027 and the nonpositive half is A065262. Cf. also A065173.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2001
